thread.title: Questlove, Pete Rock, and More React to the Death of Influential Musician David Axelrod
thread.title_full: Questlove, Pete Rock, and More React to the Death of Influential Musician David Axelrod | Complex

author: Joshua Espinoza
title: Questlove, Pete Rock, and More React to the Death of Influential Musician David Axelrod
text:
Questlove, Pete Rock, and More React to the Death of Influential Musician David Axelrod By Joshua Espinoza Find him on Twitter .
Feb Image via Instagram David Axelrod , the legendary composer and former producer at Capitol Records, has reportedly died at the age of 83.
Related Motown Singer/Songwriter Nick Ashford Dies at Age 69 On Sunday afternoon, celebrities began posting tributes to the Los Angeles native on social media, remembering him for his far-reaching influence on the music industry‚Äîspecifically in the hip-hop genre. Axelrod is widely known for being one of the first musicians to fuse elements of rock, jazz, and R&B during the 1960s and 1970s. His unique style of work has also been sampled by many, many artists in the hip-hop realm, ranging from Lil Wayne (‚ÄúDr. Carter‚Äù) and Mos Def (‚ÄúHip Hop‚Äù) to Dr. Dre (‚ÄúThe Next Episode‚Äù) and Cypress Hill ("16 Men Till There's No Men Left"). Two of his most famous tracks, ‚ÄúHoly Thursday" and "The Edge,‚Äù were featured in the Grand Theft Auto IV soundtrack in 2008.
Just a few of the David Axelrod samples in hip-hop. He was easily one of the most brilliant composers of the last half century. pic.twitter.com/hSnlsPwWx4
‚Äî Otto Von Biz Markie (@Passionweiss) February 5, 2017 Following reports of Axelrod‚Äôs death, Questlove posted a heartfelt message on Instagram, celebrating the producer‚Äôs work:
 So sad to hear about the passing of musician/composer # DavidAxelrod . He was so immersed in creativity and so pure with his arrangements he WAS hip hop. And understood and appreciated hip hop culture (most cats would get guarded about time moving on & easily take the "NO " disposition if they aren't informed. David embraced and often reached out to producers and beatmakers for cool collabos ) he appreciation for music and his ability to recognize musicianship is what I'll take from him. Rest in Melody.
A photo posted by Questlove Gomez ( @questlove ) on Feb 5, 2017 at 3: 51pm PST
Figures like Pete Rock, DJ Shadow, and Hudson Mohawke also paid tribute. You can check out some of the messages below.
 RIP David Axelrod! Died today üòî
A photo posted by Pete Rock (@realpeterock) on Feb 5, 2017 at 3:24pm PST
Producer and composer extraordinaire David Axelrod has passed. Listening to "Songs Of Experience" on repeat for the remainder of the day.
‚Äî DJ Shadow (@djshadow) February 6, 2017 I'll never forget meeting him for the first time in 1998. We asked him to do a remix for "Rabbit In Your Headlights" off the Unkle album.
‚Äî DJ Shadow ( @djshadow ) February 6, 2017 David could be incredibly intimidating, & he did not suffer fools...but if he liked & respected you, he was the most loyal friend on earth.
‚Äî DJ Shadow ( @djshadow ) February 6, 2017 Fuck. RIP David Axelrod.
‚Äî Hudson Mohawke (@HudMo) February 5, 2017 Shoot....RIP David Axelrod
‚Äî JamesPoyser (@jamespoyser) February 5, 2017 RIP David Axelrod
‚Äî Tony Mahoney (@tonyberlusconi) February 5, 2017 Just heard that David Axelrod has died. One of the greats. Hip hop owes him a lot. https://t.co/SD6SmBUsXu
‚Äî Mof (@mofgimmers) February 5, 2017 rest in peace david axelrod.
‚Äî jeremy g. (@j_thelonious) February 5, 2017 RIP David Axelrod David Axelrod - Holy Thursday https://t.co/HsNPTCjT0T
‚Äî Jeremy Grogan (@JSpade1) February 5, 2017 Damn rip David Axelrod :(
‚Äî Four Color Zack (@FOURCOLORZACK) February 5, 2017 RIP David Axelrod...if you don't know, probably the only reason you have breaks ...burn your hiphop if you don't know!
‚Äî Ejecto's graffiti (@Ejectos) February 5, 2017 RIP to the great David Axelrod
‚Äî MarcelsMusicJournal (@MarcelTheCritic) February 5, 2017 #RIP David Axelrod. Thank you for the music! üôåüé∂
‚Äî A McKay Guitar (@amckayguitar) February 6, 2017 We lost a big one today. Rest In Peace David Axelrod. Los Angeles native. One of the most influential composers of our time.
‚Äî johnny luna (@WEIRDBEACH) February 6, 2017 Learning to sample introduced me to David Axelrod and it was one of the most incredible discoveries.
‚Äî Brian (@fuelbot) February 6, 2017 Wow....RIP composer David Axelrod...a massive influence
‚Äî Submorphics (@GregSubmorphics) February 6, 2017 A source for Capitol Records did not immediately respond to Complex's request for comment.
